experience: You and Janet both know Lauretta (Laurie) Zerga, Mark McMorrine, and 94 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Janet worked at Charles Schwab before you started
"To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart." -Eleanor Roosevelt
Thankful for my time with an impressive group of Schwabbies earlier this week in Los Gatos and Sunnyvale, CA. Thanks for having me!

Providing both internal leadership and customer facing delivery including:•             Pro-actively exceeding customer expectations and enable ongoing connections•             Problem solving and coordinated team solutioning•             Insightful communication to multi-level clients and internal team•             Using multiple methodologies including Waterfall PLC, Agile, ITIL, DevOps to plan and organize work, resources, tasks and overall deliverables•             Customer value positioning, pro-active issue resolution and negotiation•             Deliver requirements analysis and functional design•             Expert in process and system architecture that applies to multiple products and ecosystems•             Broad knowledge of domain

•	Designed functional and technical Clarity PPM, Microsoft Project, and Microsoft SharePoint solutions to support business processes and resolve business problems.•	Provide functional leadership for the evaluation of a move to On-Demand versus On Premise implementation of Clarity PPM resulting in a decision to stay On Premise due to software desktop currency and cost.•	Document functional and system requirements for modifications to the project manager timesheet approval process to provide approvals for specific timesheets only, reducing unnecessary emails and approvals by 80%.•	Successfully managed project to upgrade to Clarity PPM v13.3 with all new hardware, and optimize configuration with no severity one or two defects and overwhelmingly positive user feedback to 2,400 users.•	Identify and document business, functional and system requirements for the interface of Clarity PPM and Lawson Payroll for payroll time data in order to reduce the manual work by 2 days of effort each biweekly pay period.•	Provide functional and technical support for integration of SharePoint application for approximately 100 demand requests per month to Clarity PPM.•	Gathered business requirements, created functional and system requirements for enhancements delivered in monthly and quarterly Clarity PPM releases.•	Provide day to day functional support and administration of user accounts, Clarity PPM, Microsoft Project, Clarity Microsoft Project Connector, and Microsoft SharePoint for a user base of up to 2,400 users.
• Provide skin care classes and makeup consultations to help women improve their confidence.• Networked among women in many walks of life and occupations.
Project Management Consultant at Catholic Health Initiatives (CHI)

•	Configured, tested, trained, and supported the roll-out of Clarity PPM Microsoft Project Connector and Microsoft Project to over 150 project managers. •	Provided Clarity PPM training development and delivery to over 150 project managers, 300 resource managers, program coordinators, business analysts, and portfolio managers as part of the on-boarding and Clarity PPM release process. •	Developed CA Productivity Accelerator modules to support Clarity PPM functionality for resource management, project management, and time entry for almost 2,000 users.•	Gathering business requirements, documenting, reviewing, performing user acceptance testing, and production validation for quarterly Clarity PPM functionality releases.•	Developed WEBi reports using Infoview for regular and ad-hoc usage, including testing and release to project managers and resource managers. •	Served as interim and backup Clarity PPM implementation project manager.

•	Managed, motivated, and mentored multi-disciplinary team of 23 engineers located in four states and offshore and a $3.5 million budget, supporting cost basis applications used by 300 internal users and over 7.5 million external users. •	Centralized testing of all cost basis applications and reduced cost by 28%, annual savings of $920,000 with increased quality and coverage in 18 months.•	Architected and delivered Clarity PPM infrastructure project to support 2,000 users in less than 3 months, within budget and 50% faster than expected.•	Managed vendor relationships, and drove strategic requests for functionality with Microsoft, IBM Rational and HP Mercury. •	Created a corporate strategic vision for enterprise software development tools across the Software Development Life Cycle, presented to senior management team, and received approval to implement.•	Developed a technology application selection strategy to support the software development lifecycle communities, and led cross-functional selection communities resulting in reduced costs through centralized negotiations and purchases.•	Established organizational development standards, creating supportable environments and reducing the total cost of ownership.•	Led companywide consolidation of disparate Rational ClearCase systems, acquired $250,000 in funding, architected system infrastructure, and transferred over 400 GB of data with minimal user disruptions, reduced downtime by 90% and increase response time by 30%. •	Built and managed a distributed high performing deployment and configuration management team supporting standardized releases for more than 100 internal and external J2EE and enterprise applications across five departments. •	Received 3 Excellence in Service Awards for outstanding performance, awarded to less than 1% of all employees.

recommendations: Angela Strous
Project Portfolio Management Product Owner
December 8, 2015, Angela was senior to Janet but didn’t manage directly

Janet brings a unique blend of functional, technical, and practical expertise to her role as a Clarity administrator.  I have worked with Janet for over 5 years at Catholic Health Initiatives during which time she has served as a trainer, project manager, and system administrator.  Janet played a key role in our integration of Clarity and MS Project and is expert in both systems.  More important, Janet understands that the project management information system must be fully integrated with project management best practices and real world usage.  She not only managed multiple Clarity upgrades and implementations, but she used the tool to do so.  Janet is committed to customer service and was recently recognized for unlocking a user’s account… before the user even knew it was locked.  She had proactively implemented a process to notify system admins when a user account was locked during high volume times.  Janet has been a key contributor to our PMO’s journey and I highly recommend her to be part of yours.

Marc Kia
Release Manager at Apple
July 9, 2009, Marc reported directly to Janet

Janet is a seasoned technical architect and thought leader with many years of configuration management, release engineering, and software lifecycle tools experience. While at Schwab, I had the pleasure of working with Janet on CM operations and evaluating and implementing a multitude of industry tools such as Rational UCM (Unified Change Management), Rational Build Forge and Electric Cloud for software build, deploy, and test automation, and code search and re-use using Krugle Enterprise. Janet will be an asset to any growing and dynamic organization.

Graham Day
Principle Performance Engineer
June 15, 2009, Graham reported directly to Janet

While at Charles Schwab, Janet served as Director of QA and critical engineering. I had the opportunity to work as lead QA engineer for Janet for over two years. During that time I found Janet to be an exceedingly competent director, with a broad technical base, great organizational skills and concern for her team. Her leadership inspired her team to go the extra mile as often as was necessary. Janet has an amazing understanding of the software development life-cycle, and more specifically the processes and procedures required to make QA work effectively.  Her knowledge in these areas made her an exceptional QA manager. She always had a clear understanding of any issues I brought to her and was ready to propose carefully thought out and effective solutions. Her concern for the team, her vision, and her drive for constant improvement made her an excellent Director to work for, and a highly effective leader of a QA team. I would happily work for Janet again, if given the opportunity.

Jim Dulebohn
Managing Director, IT at Charles Schwab
March 9, 2009, Janet worked with Jim in the same group

Janet and I were 2 of 5 directors managing one of the largest development projects undertaken at Schwab.  Janet’s role was to manage QA, general testing support, and release management - the area where all activity comes together.  Janet did a great job of keeping several balls in the air:  maintaining a stable production system, providing QA and test support for three separate teams of developers under very tight deadlines, moving her  organization from SF to Denver, and growing our off-shore team.  Having managed support teams myself I know how it can be a thankless job but Janet was always positive and upbeat.

summary: Versatile and adaptable professional with more than 15 years of experience directing and managing technology and technical teams, including large multi-disciplinary teams located in multiple states and offshore. Passionate about producing high performing, innovative approaches to address complex and difficult challenges. Strong project management experience combined with broad technical background, strategic propensity, and solid business acumen to meet critical and aggressive timelines. Infrastructure and systems architect with deep application functional knowledge.Specialties: Deployment, Optimistic, Problem-solver, Leadership, Organizer, Project management, Effective communicator, Dynamic, Customer focus, Process transformation
